text: bhūmiya tama deviyangē ‘ālōkaya’magin ālōkamatva bæbalennēya. (ovunovungē) saṭahan piṭuva (ovun idiriyē) tabanu læbē. nabivarunvada, (ovungē anit) sākṣīnda gena enu læba, ovun atarē sādhāraṇa lesa tīndu denu læbē. (ovungē pin valin ek anu pramāṇayak hō aḍu kara hō, pāpayangen ek anu pramāṇayak hō væḍi kara hō) ovunṭa aparādhayak karanu labannēma næta
